long_description: Want minimalist shoes that also support your feet? Nike Free 5.0 road-running shoes are the most supportive shoe in the Nike Free family, balancing a minimalist fit with underfoot cushioning. 8mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural forefoot strike while still providing cushioning. Lightweight polyester mesh uppers are highly breathable for enhanced comfort; uppers were designed with minimal seams for maximum comfort. Synthetic microfiber overlays provide lightweight support; thermoplastic urethane toe caps and heel counters deliver additional protection, structure and support. Asymmetric lacing reduces pressure on the top of the foot. Ultralight Flywire supports use reinforced threads to wrap the midfoot and rearfoot areas for a secure, supportive fit that minimizes slippage. Polyester linings wick moisture away from the feet for extended comfort; multi-density foam midsoles cushion and support feet throughout your stride. Rubber waffle outsoles utilize abrasion-resistant rubber in high-wear areas for maximum durability; flex grooves along shoes enhance flexibility an efficient stride.
short_description: Want minimalist shoes that also support your feet? Nike Free 5.0 road-running shoes are the most supportive shoe in the Nike Free family, balancing a minimalist fit with underfoot cushioning.
